When you create them on PC

When you create a note on PC, It's very important to name it correctly.

 		The name should begin with title, without underline symbols ("_"), because it is used like a separator symbol.
 		Next you can see the numbers - it's the date of note creation. You can write it in next format: dd-mm-yyyy. For example, the name of note: Best places of New York_12-12-2020

 		This is the note with title "Best places of New York", created at December,12 2020

The settings indicate the path where your notes are saved. To check that they are saved correctly, click on the icon phone opposite the phrase "Save all notes to .txt format". Next, follow these steps:
 		1. Connect the phone to the computer via the charging cable
 		2. Select "USB Mode" - "File Transfer"
 		3. On the computer, go to My Computer (This Computer) and open your phone.
 		4. Next, follow the path specified in the settings. So, for example, if the path "Android/data/files" is specified, then you need to go to the Android -> data -> files folder.
